00032 namespace stable_ksort_local
00033 {
00034     template <class type_, class type_key>
00035     void classify_block(type_ * begin, type_ * end, type_key * & out, int_type * bucket, unsigned_type offset, unsigned shift)
00036     {
00037         for (type_ * p = begin; p < end; p++, out++) // count & create references
00038         {
00039             out->ptr = p;
00040             typename type_::key_type key = p->key();
00041             int_type ibucket = (key - offset) >> shift;
00042             out->key = key;
00043             bucket[ibucket]++;
00044         }
00045     }
00046 
00047     template <typename type>
00048     struct type_key
00049     {
00050         typedef typename type::key_type key_type;
00051         key_type key;
00052         type * ptr;
00053 
00054         type_key() { };
00055         type_key(key_type k, type * p) : key (k), ptr (p)
00056         { };
00057     };
00058 
00059     template <typename type>
00060     bool operator  < (const type_key<type> & a, const type_key<type> & b)
00061     {
00062         return a.key < b.key;
00063     }
00064 
00065     template <typename type>
00066     bool operator  > (const type_key<type> & a, const type_key<type> & b)
00067     {
00068         return a.key > b.key;
00069     }
00070 
00071 
00072     template <typename BIDType_, typename AllocStrategy_>
00073     class bid_sequence
00074     {
00075     public:
00076         typedef BIDType_ bid_type;
00077         typedef bid_type & reference;
00078         typedef AllocStrategy_ alloc_strategy;
00079         typedef typename simple_vector<bid_type>::size_type size_type;
00080         typedef typename simple_vector<bid_type>::iterator iterator;
00081     protected:
00082         simple_vector<bid_type> *bids;
00083         alloc_strategy alloc_strategy_;
00084 
00085 
00086     public:
00087         bid_sequence() { }
00088         bid_sequence(size_type size_)
00089         {
00090             bids = new simple_vector<bid_type>(size_);
00091             block_manager * mng = block_manager::get_instance();
00092             mng->new_blocks(alloc_strategy_, bids->begin(), bids->end());
00093         }
00094         void init(size_type size_)
00095         {
00096             bids = new simple_vector<bid_type>(size_);
00097             block_manager * mng = block_manager::get_instance();
00098             mng->new_blocks(alloc_strategy_, bids->begin(), bids->end());
00099         }
00100         reference operator [] (size_type i)
00101         {
00102             size_type size_ = size();             // cache size in a register
00103             if (i < size_)
00104                 return *(bids->begin() + i);
00105 
00106 
00107             block_manager * mng = block_manager::get_instance();
00108             simple_vector<bid_type> *larger_bids = new simple_vector<bid_type>((i + 1) * 2);
00109             std::copy(bids->begin(), bids->end(), larger_bids->begin());
00110             mng->new_blocks(alloc_strategy_, larger_bids->begin() + size_, larger_bids->end());
00111             delete bids;
00112             bids = larger_bids;
00113             return *(larger_bids->begin() + i);
00114         }
00115         size_type size() { return bids->size(); }
00116         iterator begin() { return bids->begin(); }
00117         ~bid_sequence()
00118         {
00119             block_manager::get_instance()->delete_blocks(bids->begin(), bids->end());
00120             delete bids;
00121         }
00122     };
00123 
00124     template <typename ExtIterator_>
00125     void distribute(
00126         bid_sequence < typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::block_type::bid_type,
00127         typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::alloc_strategy > * bucket_bids,
00128         int64 * bucket_sizes,
00129         const int_type nbuckets,
00130         const int_type lognbuckets,
00131         ExtIterator_ first,
00132         ExtIterator_ last,
00133         const int_type nread_buffers,
00134         const int_type nwrite_buffers)
00135     {
00136         typedef typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::value_type value_type;
00137         typedef typename value_type::key_type key_type;
00138         typedef typename ExtIterator_::block_type block_type;
00139         typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00140         typedef buf_istream < typename ExtIterator_::block_type,
00141         typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator > buf_istream_type;
00142 
00143         int_type i = 0;
00144 
00145         buf_istream_type in(first.bid(), last.bid() + ((first.block_offset()) ? 1 : 0),
00146                             nread_buffers);
00147 
00148         buffered_writer<block_type> out(
00149             nbuckets + nwrite_buffers,
00150             nwrite_buffers);
00151 
00152         unsigned_type * bucket_block_offsets = new unsigned_type [nbuckets];
00153         unsigned_type * bucket_iblock = new unsigned_type [nbuckets];
00154         block_type * * bucket_blocks = new block_type *[nbuckets];
00155 
00156         std::fill(bucket_sizes, bucket_sizes + nbuckets, 0);
00157         std::fill(bucket_iblock, bucket_iblock + nbuckets, 0);
00158         std::fill(bucket_block_offsets, bucket_block_offsets + nbuckets, 0);
00159 
00160         for (i = 0; i < nbuckets; i++)
00161             bucket_blocks[i] = out.get_free_block();
00162 
00163 
00164         ExtIterator_ cur = first - first.block_offset();
00165 
00166         // skip part of the block before first untouched
00167         for ( ; cur != first; cur++)
00168             ++in;
00169 
00170 
00171         const int_type shift = sizeof(key_type) * 8 - lognbuckets;
00172         // search in the the range [_begin,_end)
00173         for ( ; cur != last; cur++)
00174         {
00175             key_type cur_key = in.current().key();
00176             int_type ibucket = cur_key >> shift;
00177 
00178             int_type block_offset = bucket_block_offsets[ibucket];
00179             in >> (bucket_blocks[ibucket]->elem[block_offset++]);
00180             if (block_offset == block_type::size)
00181             {
00182                 block_offset = 0;
00183                 int_type iblock = bucket_iblock[ibucket]++;
00184                 bucket_blocks[ibucket] = out.write(bucket_blocks[ibucket], bucket_bids[ibucket][iblock]);
00185             }
00186             bucket_block_offsets[ibucket] = block_offset;
00187         }
00188         for (i = 0; i < nbuckets; i++)
00189         {
00190             if (bucket_block_offsets[i])
00191             {
00192                 out.write(bucket_blocks[i], bucket_bids[i][bucket_iblock[i]]);
00193             }
00194             bucket_sizes[i] = int64(block_type::size) * bucket_iblock[i] +
00195                               bucket_block_offsets[i];
00196             STXXL_MSG("Bucket " << i << " has size " << bucket_sizes[i] <<
00197                       ", estimated size: " << ((last - first) / int64(nbuckets)));
00198         }
00199 
00200 
00201         delete [] bucket_blocks;
00202         delete [] bucket_block_offsets;
00203         delete [] bucket_iblock;
00204     }
00205 }
00206 
00207 template <typename ExtIterator_>
00208 void stable_ksort(ExtIterator_ first, ExtIterator_ last, unsigned_type M)
00209 {
00210     typedef typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::value_type value_type;
00211     typedef typename value_type::key_type key_type;
00212     typedef typename ExtIterator_::block_type block_type;
00213     typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00214     typedef typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::alloc_strategy alloc_strategy;
00215     typedef stable_ksort_local::bid_sequence<bid_type, alloc_strategy> bucket_bids_type;
00216     typedef stable_ksort_local::type_key<value_type> type_key_;
00217 
00218     first.flush();     // flush container
00219 
00220 #ifdef STXXL_IO_STATS
00221     stats * iostats = stats::get_instance ();
00222     iostats += 0;
00223     // iostats->reset ();
00224 #endif
00225 
00226     reset_io_wait_time();
00227 
00228 
00229     double begin = stxxl_timestamp();
00230     (void)(begin);
00231 
00232 
00233     unsigned_type i = 0;
00234     config * cfg = config::get_instance();
00235     const unsigned_type m = M / block_type::raw_size;
00236     assert(2 * block_type::raw_size <= M);
00237     const unsigned_type write_buffers_multiple = 2;
00238     const unsigned_type read_buffers_multiple = 2;
00239     const unsigned_type ndisks = cfg->ndisks();
00240     const unsigned_type nmaxbuckets = m - (write_buffers_multiple + read_buffers_multiple) * ndisks;
00241     const unsigned_type lognbuckets = static_cast<unsigned_type>(log2(double (nmaxbuckets)));
00242     const unsigned_type nbuckets = 1 << lognbuckets;
00243     const unsigned_type est_bucket_size = div_and_round_up((last - first) / int64(nbuckets),
00244                                                            int64(block_type::size)); //in blocks
00245 
00246     STXXL_MSG("Elements to sort: " << (last - first));
00247     STXXL_MSG("Number of buckets has to be reduced from " << nmaxbuckets << " to " << nbuckets);
00248     const unsigned_type nread_buffers = (m - nbuckets) * read_buffers_multiple / (read_buffers_multiple + write_buffers_multiple);
00249     const unsigned_type nwrite_buffers = (m - nbuckets) * write_buffers_multiple / (read_buffers_multiple + write_buffers_multiple);
00250 
00251     STXXL_MSG("Read buffers in distribution phase: " << nread_buffers);
00252     STXXL_MSG("Write buffers in distribution phase: " << nwrite_buffers);
00253 
00254     bucket_bids_type * bucket_bids = new bucket_bids_type[nbuckets];
00255     for (i = 0; i < nbuckets; ++i)
00256         bucket_bids[i].init(est_bucket_size);
00257 
00258     int64 * bucket_sizes = new int64[nbuckets];
00259 
00260     disk_queues::get_instance()->set_priority_op(disk_queue::WRITE);
00261 
00262     stable_ksort_local::distribute(
00263         bucket_bids,
00264         bucket_sizes,
00265         nbuckets,
00266         lognbuckets,
00267         first,
00268         last,
00269         write_buffers_multiple * ndisks,
00270         read_buffers_multiple * ndisks );
00271 
00272     double dist_end = stxxl_timestamp(), end;
00273     (void)(dist_end);
00274 #ifdef COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00275     double io_wait_after_d = stxxl::wait_time_counter;
00276     (void)(io_wait_after_d);
00277 #endif
00278 
00279     {
00280         // sort buckets
00281         unsigned_type write_buffers_multiple_bs = 2;
00282         unsigned_type max_bucket_size_bl = (m - write_buffers_multiple_bs * ndisks) / 2; // in number of blocks
00283         int64 max_bucket_size_rec = int64(max_bucket_size_bl) * block_type::size; // in number of records
00284         int64 max_bucket_size_act = 0; // actual max bucket size
00285         // establish output stream
00286 
00287         for (i = 0; i < nbuckets; i++)
00288         {
00289             max_bucket_size_act = STXXL_MAX(bucket_sizes[i], max_bucket_size_act);
00290             if (bucket_sizes[i] > max_bucket_size_rec)
00291             {
00292                 STXXL_ERRMSG("Bucket " << i << " is too large: " << bucket_sizes[i] <<
00293                              " records, maximum: " << max_bucket_size_rec);
00294                 STXXL_ERRMSG("Recursion on buckets is not yet implemented, aborting.");
00295                 abort();
00296             }
00297         }
00298         // here we can increase write_buffers_multiple_b knowing max(bucket_sizes[i])
00299         // ... and decrease max_bucket_size_bl
00300         const int_type max_bucket_size_act_bl = div_and_round_up(max_bucket_size_act, block_type::size);
00301         STXXL_MSG("Reducing required number of required blocks per bucket from " <<
00302                   max_bucket_size_bl << " to " << max_bucket_size_act_bl);
00303         max_bucket_size_rec = max_bucket_size_act;
00304         max_bucket_size_bl = max_bucket_size_act_bl;
00305         const unsigned_type nwrite_buffers_bs = m - 2 * max_bucket_size_bl;
00306         STXXL_MSG("Write buffers in bucket sorting phase: " << nwrite_buffers_bs);
00307 
00308         typedef buf_ostream < block_type, typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator > buf_ostream_type;
00309         buf_ostream_type out(first.bid(), nwrite_buffers_bs);
00310 
00311         disk_queues::get_instance()->set_priority_op(disk_queue::READ);
00312 
00313         if (first.block_offset())
00314         {
00315             // has to skip part of the first block
00316             block_type * block = new block_type;
00317             request_ptr req;
00318             req = block->read(*first.bid());
00319             req->wait();
00320 
00321             for (i = 0; i < first.block_offset(); i++)
00322             {
00323                 out << block->elem[i];
00324             }
00325             delete block;
00326         }
00327         block_type * blocks1 = new block_type[max_bucket_size_bl];
00328         block_type * blocks2 = new block_type[max_bucket_size_bl];
00329         request_ptr * reqs1 = new request_ptr [max_bucket_size_bl];
00330         request_ptr * reqs2 = new request_ptr [max_bucket_size_bl];
00331         type_key_ * refs1 = new type_key_[max_bucket_size_rec];
00332         type_key_ * refs2 = new type_key_[max_bucket_size_rec];
00333 
00334         // submit reading first 2 buckets (Peter's scheme)
00335         unsigned_type nbucket_blocks = div_and_round_up(bucket_sizes[0], block_type::size);
00336         for (i = 0; i < nbucket_blocks; i++)
00337             reqs1[i] = blocks1[i].read(bucket_bids[0][i]);
00338 
00339 
00340         nbucket_blocks = div_and_round_up(bucket_sizes[1], block_type::size);
00341         for (i = 0; i < nbucket_blocks; i++)
00342             reqs2[i] = blocks2[i].read(bucket_bids[1][i]);
00343 
00344 
00345         key_type offset = 0;
00346         unsigned_type log_k1 = static_cast<unsigned_type>(ceil(log2(double (max_bucket_size_rec *
00347                                                                             sizeof(type_key_) / STXXL_L2_SIZE))));
00348         unsigned_type k1 = 1 << log_k1;
00349         int_type * bucket1 = new int_type[k1];
00350 
00351         const unsigned shift = sizeof(key_type) * 8 - lognbuckets;
00352         const unsigned shift1 = shift - log_k1;
00353 
00354         for (unsigned_type k = 0; k < nbuckets; k++)
00355         {
00356             nbucket_blocks = div_and_round_up(bucket_sizes[k], block_type::size);
00357             log_k1 = static_cast<unsigned>(ceil(log2(double (bucket_sizes[k] *
00358                                                              sizeof(type_key_) / STXXL_L2_SIZE))));
00359             k1 = 1 << log_k1;
00360             std::fill(bucket1, bucket1 + k1, 0);
00361 
00362             STXXL_MSG("Classifying bucket " << k << " size:" << bucket_sizes[k] <<
00363                       " blocks:" << nbucket_blocks << " log_k1:" << log_k1);
00364             // classify first nbucket_blocks-1 blocks, they are full
00365             type_key_ * ref_ptr = refs1;
00366             key_type offset1 = offset + (key_type(1) << key_type(shift)) * key_type(k);
00367             for (i = 0; i < nbucket_blocks - 1; i++)
00368             {
00369                 reqs1[i]->wait();
00370                 stable_ksort_local::classify_block(blocks1[i].begin(), blocks1[i].end(), ref_ptr, bucket1, offset1, shift1 /*,k1*/);
00371             }
00372             // last block might be non-full
00373             const unsigned_type last_block_size = bucket_sizes[k] - int64(nbucket_blocks - 1) * block_type::size;
00374             reqs1[i]->wait();
00375 
00376             //STXXL_MSG("block_type::size: "<<block_type::size<<" last_block_size:"<<last_block_size);
00377 
00378             classify_block(blocks1[i].begin(), blocks1[i].begin() + last_block_size, ref_ptr, bucket1, offset1, shift1);
00379 
00380             exclusive_prefix_sum(bucket1, k1);
00381             classify(refs1, refs1 + bucket_sizes[k], refs2, bucket1, offset1, shift1);
00382 
00383             type_key_ * c = refs2;
00384             type_key_ * d = refs1;
00385             for (i = 0; i < k1; i++)
00386             {
00387                 type_key_ * cEnd = refs2 + bucket1[i];
00388                 type_key_ * dEnd = refs1 + bucket1[i];
00389 
00390                 const unsigned log_k2 = static_cast<unsigned>(log2(double (bucket1[i]))) - 1;        // adaptive bucket size
00391                 const unsigned_type k2 = 1 << log_k2;
00392                 int_type * bucket2 = new int_type[k2];
00393                 const unsigned shift2 = shift1 - log_k2;
00394 
00395                 // STXXL_MSG("Sorting bucket "<<k<<":"<<i);
00396                 l1sort (c, cEnd, d, bucket2, k2,
00397                         offset1 + (key_type(1) << key_type(shift1)) * key_type(i),
00398                         shift2);
00399 
00400                 // write out all
00401                 for (type_key_ * p = d; p < dEnd; p++)
00402                     out << (*(p->ptr));
00403 
00404 
00405                 delete [] bucket2;
00406                 c = cEnd;
00407                 d = dEnd;
00408             }
00409             // submit next read
00410             const unsigned_type bucket2submit = k + 2;
00411             if ( bucket2submit < nbuckets )
00412             {
00413                 nbucket_blocks = div_and_round_up(bucket_sizes[bucket2submit], block_type::size);
00414                 for (i = 0; i < nbucket_blocks; i++)
00415                     reqs1[i] = blocks1[i].read(bucket_bids[bucket2submit][i]);
00416             }
00417 
00418             std::swap (blocks1, blocks2);
00419             std::swap (reqs1, reqs2);
00420         }
00421 
00422         delete [] bucket1;
00423         delete [] refs1;
00424         delete [] refs2;
00425         delete [] blocks1;
00426         delete [] blocks2;
00427         delete [] reqs1;
00428         delete [] reqs2;
00429         delete [] bucket_bids;
00430         delete [] bucket_sizes;
00431 
00432         if (last.block_offset())
00433         {
00434             // has to skip part of the first block
00435             block_type * block = new block_type;
00436             request_ptr req = block->read(*last.bid());
00437             req->wait();
00438 
00439             for (i = last.block_offset(); i < block_type::size; i++)
00440             {
00441                 out << block->elem[i];
00442             }
00443             delete block;
00444         }
00445 
00446         end = stxxl_timestamp();
00447     }
00448 
00449     STXXL_VERBOSE ("Elapsed time        : " << end - begin << " s. Distribution time: " <<
00450                    dist_end - begin << " s");
00451 #ifdef STXXL_IO_STATS
00452     STXXL_VERBOSE ("reads               : " << iostats->get_reads ());
00453     STXXL_VERBOSE ("writes              : " << iostats->get_writes ());
00454     STXXL_VERBOSE ("read time           : " << iostats->get_read_time () << " s");
00455     STXXL_VERBOSE ("write time          : " << iostats->get_write_time () << " s");
00456     STXXL_VERBOSE ("parallel read time  : " << iostats->get_pread_time () << " s");
00457     STXXL_VERBOSE ("parallel write time : " << iostats->get_pwrite_time () << " s");
00458     STXXL_VERBOSE ("parallel io time    : " << iostats->get_pio_time () << " s");
00459 #endif
00460 #ifdef COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00461     STXXL_VERBOSE ("Time in I/O wait(ds): " << io_wait_after_d << " s");
00462     STXXL_VERBOSE ("Time in I/O wait    : " << stxxl::wait_time_counter << " s");
00463 #endif
00464 }
